emulator.core.gpu

Class GPU

  • java.lang.Object
    • emulator.core.gpu.GPU

  • public class GPU
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles writing pixels to the main display. Also, handles all the LCD related registers by bypassing the memory.
    Author:
    Daniel Simpkins

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GPU(Memory memory)
      Initializes a display window as well as sets the video related registers to default values.

      • GPU

        public GPU(Memory memory)
        Initializes a display window as well as sets the video related registers to default values.

      • readRegister

        public byte readRegister(int address)
        Retrieves the value of a hardware register at a specified address. Returns a 0xFF if there was an error.
        Parameters:
        address - Address of the hardware register
        Returns:
        Value of the hardware register

      • writeRegister

        public void writeRegister(byte in,
                          int address)
        Writes to a hardware register within the LCD video module.
        Parameters:
        in - 8-bit byte to write to the register
        address - Address of the hardware register
